name: Moving Forward (itch)
description:
When four explorers decided to enter into a mysterious temple, they knew that dangers would be lurking, but none of them were expecting to be trapped among those ruins...

Who will you be able to save from this terrible twist of fate?

Game originally designed for Ludum Dare #43

Theme : Sacrifices must be made

Time : 1 month

Loïc da Silva : Game Design, Level Design, Character Art & Illustrations

Nicolas Roland : Game Design & Level Design

Alban Gorin : Level Design & Environment Art

Wind : Programming

Lucas Friche : Music & Sound Design

Viktor Kraus : Music
